Ninjutsu {G} [i]({G}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)[/i]
Flash
[i]Distracting Feint[/i] – When Kaze, Loyal Ninja, creatures you control gain hexproof until end of turn.
[i]Poison Strike[/i] – Whenever a Ninja you control deals combat damage to a player, that player gets two poison counters.
